To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Performance of Faded Love, written by Bob Wills and Johnnie Wills, recorded on April 27, 1950 at Radio Recorders in Hollywood, CA, released on MGM in September 1950, and performed by Bob Wills (fiddle), Rusty McDonald (lead vocal), Eldon Shamblin (guitar), Luke Wills (banjo), Jack Lloyd (bass), Tommy Perkins (drums), Mancel Tierney (piano), Johnny Gimble (fiddle), and Keith Coleman (fiddle and vocal).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
